maml:description.maml:para: Encrypts sensitive data (e.g. password, SQL Server connection string) and returns an encrypted value.
The New-AzureDataFactoryEncryptValue cmdlet encrypts sensitive data (e.g. password, SQL Server connection string) and returns an encrypted value.
Value that needs to be encrypted.
Value that needs to be encrypted.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
$value = ConvertTo-SecureString 'Data Source=servername;Initial Catalog=catelog;user id =user123;password=password123' -AsPlainText -Force New-AzureDataFactoryEncryptValue -GatewayName wikiGateway -DataFactoryName wikiadf -Value $value -ResourceGroupName ADF
data source=servername;initial catalog=catelog;

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns the encrypted value for connection string you passed for the Value parameter.
Returns the encrypted value for string you passed for the Value parameter.

maml:description.maml:para: Sets the description for the gateway.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Set-AzureDataFactoryGateway -Name gatewaySample -ResourceGroupName ADF -DataFactoryName WikiADF -Description "my gateway sample"
Name : gatewaySample Location : West US Description : my gateway sample Version : 1.3.5338.1 Status : Online VersionStatus : UpToDate CreateTime : 8/22/2014 1:31:09 AM RegisterTime : 8/22/2014 1:31:37 AM LastConnectTime : 8/22/2014 1:41:41 AM ExpiryTime :

dev:remarks.maml:para: Sets the description for the gateway 'gatewaySample'.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a gateway key for the specified Azure data factory gateway.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates a gateway key for the Azure data factory gateway 'gatewaySample'.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a gateway in the specified Azure data factory.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
New-AzureDataFactoryGateway -ResourceGroupName ADF -Name gatewaySample -DataFactoryName wikiADF -Location WestUs -Description "my gateway"
Name : gatewaySample Location : West US Description : my gateway Version : Status : NeedRegistration VersionStatus : None CreateTime : 8/22/2014 1:40:34 AM RegisterTime : LastConnectTime : ExpiryTime :

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates a gateway 'gatewaySample' in the Azure data factory 'wikiADF'.

maml:description.maml:para: Removes the specified gateway from an Azure data factory.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Remove-AzureDataFactoryGateway -Name gatewaySample -DataFactoryName WikiADF -ResourceGroupName ADF
Confirm Are you sure you want to remove gateway 'gatewaySample' in data factory 'WikiADF'? [Y] Yes [N] No [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is Y): Y True

dev:remarks.maml:para: Removes the gateway 'gatewaySample' from the Azure data factory 'WikiADF'.

maml:description.maml:para: Gets information about a specific gateway or all gateways in an Azure data factory.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzureDataFactoryGateway -ResourceGroupName ADF -DataFactoryName wikiadf
Name : gateway1 Location : West US Description : Version : 1.3.5338.1 Status : Online VersionStatus : UpToDate CreateTime : 8/22/2014 1:40:34 AM RegisterTime : 8/22/2014 1:41:46 AM LastConnectTime : 8/22/2014 1:44:56 AM ExpiryTime :
Name : gateway2 Location : West US Description : Version : 1.3.5338.1 Status : Offline VersionStatus : UpToDate CreateTime : 8/29/2014 1:46:44 AM RegisterTime : 8/29/2014 1:48:36 AM LastConnectTime : 8/29/2014 1:56:56 AM ExpiryTime :

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets information about all gateways in the Azure data factory 'WikiADF'.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzureDataFactoryGateway -ResourceGroupName ADF -DataFactoryName wikiadf -Name gateway1
Name : gateway1 Location : West US Description : Version : 1.3.5338.1 Status : Online VersionStatus : UpToDate CreateTime : 8/22/2014 1:40:34 AM RegisterTime : 8/22/2014 1:41:46 AM LastConnectTime : 8/22/2014 1:44:56 AM ExpiryTime :

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets information about the gateway 'gateway1' in the Azure data factory 'WikiADF'.

maml:description.maml:para: Gets information about a specific Azure data factory or all Azure data factories in the specified Azure resource group.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------

dev:remarks.maml:para: Displays information about all data factories in the Azure subscription.
